title: From layoffs to AI, BofA flags the 4 big takeaways for investors from earnings season

title: A high-net-worth money manager details a 2-part investing strategy that combines conservative stock investing with opportunistic dip-buying
description: Investing pros say don't try to time the stock market. This wealth manager's strategy let's you do it smartly.

title: The recent struggles of top AI stocks show investors are realizing they were 'sold a bill of goods,' AI scientist says

title: A16z partner says that the theory that we'll vibe code everything is 'flat wrong'
description: Vibe coding everything is just not worth it, says A16z partner Anish Acharya.

title: Anthropic's latest AI tool was seen by the legal software industry as a 'shot across the bow.' Here's what it means.
description: A new plugin from the AI startup has sent legal tech into a spin, sparking debate across the industry.

title: How this job went from the Wall Street equivalent of a used car dealer to the hottest gig for 2026

title: Every movie Margot Robbie has been in, ranked from worst to best by critics
description: From "Barbie" and "Birds of Prey" to "Wolf of Wall Street," Margot Robbie has been in a number of critical flops and hit movies.

title: Where banks should focus AI spending to stay ahead, from Wall Street's AI scorekeeper

title: Harvey makes a big exec hire as legal tech competition heats up
